Uses of Interface
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.datacenters.Datacenter

  • Packages that use Datacenter 
    Package Description
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.allocationpolicies
    The package provides classes that implement policies for a Datacenter to select a Host to place or migrate a VM, based on some criteria defined by each class.
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.datacenters
    The package provides Datacenter implementations.
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.datacenters.network  
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.datacenters.power  
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.hosts
    The package provides Host implementations.
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.resources
    The package provides classes that represent different physical and logical Resource.
    org.cloudsimplus.builders
    The package provides Builder classes that implement the Builder Design Pattern to allow instantianting multiple simulation objects more easily.
    org.cloudsimplus.listeners
    The package includes EventListener implementations to provide event notification for simulations.

      Sets the list of storage devices of the switches.
      Datacenter Datacenter.setStorageList(List<FileStorage> storageList)
      Sets the list of storage devices of the switches.
      protected Datacenter DatacenterSimple.setVmAllocationPolicy(VmAllocationPolicy vmAllocationPolicy)
      Sets the policy to be used by the switches to allocate VMs into hosts.

    • Uses of Datacenter in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.datacenters.network

      Classes in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.datacenters.network that implement Datacenter 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  NetworkDatacenter
      NetworkDatacenter class is a Datacenter whose hostList are virtualized and networked.

    • Uses of Datacenter in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.datacenters.power

      Classes in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.datacenters.power that implement Datacenter 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  PowerDatacenter
      PowerDatacenter is a class that enables simulation of power-aware data centers.
      class  PowerDatacenterNonPowerAware
      PowerDatacenterNonPowerAware is a class that represents a non-power aware data center in the context of power-aware simulations.
